{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = CLEAR_Modem_with_Wi-Fi_(WIXFBR-117) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = CLEAR |model = WIXFBR-117 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = WiMAX modem,access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MXFWIXFBR-117 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Beceem;BCSB5200-3; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = <!-- true, --> |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = AC:81:12
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB (non-standard connector) |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = No
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = WiMAX |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.15.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultpass = CLEAR123 |defaultssid = WiFiRSU_XX |defaultssid_regex = ^WiFiRSU_[0-9a-f]{2}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WIXFBR-117 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/27/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 094922011176 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0068B3642 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Gemtek WIXFBR-117USB |rad1modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3070; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== BCSB5200-3 + BCSR200 WiMAX chipset (BCS5250)
According to [http://www.nintendo.com/consumer/wfc/en_na/routers/Gemtek/WIXFBR-117.jsp Nintendo's Router Database], the device assumes the SSID of 'WiFiRSU_XX' where 'XX' is the last two digits of the ( MAC address.
It is also said that the default WiFi password is the last eight digits of the MAC address.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
